text:
After reading the article at the URL, I tried the JSP example in it. I found 
characters other than ASCII(e.g. Chinese characters) was incorrectly presented 
when running on Tomcat 5.5.9 and 5.5.15. But it was all right on Sun 
Application Server 8.2. I think there is something wrong with 
Request.getParameter(), possibly string encoding missing.
creator: hwtcontest@163.com
hwtcontest@163.com
text: But it is OK when POST method is used.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
Please read http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/config/http.html
and read the section on the URIEncoding parameter.
